39446554.review:
Un jeu gratuit qui vous permettra de jouer à de multiples petits jeux assez variés. Foot, "tennis" (règles modifiées légèrement), balle au prisonnier, laser game, paintball, et trois (bientôt davantage) quêtes qui vous occuperont pendant plusieurs heures !

39425256.review: Free, really fun and basically the Wii Sports of VR. Everyone can enjoy it and it's practically essential for VR users. Cross platform compatible too and has a relatively active playerbase!

39423819.review: Best bunch of mini games ever recommended for kids and adults alike.

39395053.review: This is really great and high replay value. Its a collection of REALLY GOOD multi-player PvP and Co-op games. Recommend this to everyone who has jumped in the VR train. And its FREE too. wow!!

39380408.review: Absolutely my favorite VR title.  This free game is better then any other VR game I have payed for.

39380100.review: The most fun I've had in VR so far! In large part due to how they handle controls and movement; it's perfect! Teleporting is fast and fluid, and they dim the sides when you move and turn so you don't get sick. Being able to grab items without needing to get right up next to them is great when you're running all around, and the games are all designed with VR in mind so they're easy to pick up and play. Guns don't need reloading like in other games, and there's just enough realism that you can immerse yourself but not so much that it's hard to play. Voice chat is easy and everyone's been quite friendly. The games are all super fun as well; there's a bit of a lack of any single player content or a dedicated practice mode so I've had to learn by doing. That'd be a nice add-on, but the game forces players to be social. They've completely nailed the game's interface and presentation and there's so much polish that it shines well above all the other virtual hub games I've played. Go try it!

39378186.review:
This is hands-down one of the best VR games out right now. Not only is it free, but it has more content than most of the games you have to purchase for $20+ in addition to it being multiplayer, and still being updated.

If you have a VR, like online Multiplayer, like action games, laser tag, paint ball, Sports, or other fun mini-games to play with friends/random people online. Download this.

39523771.review:
Awesome game! Must have for anyone on VR, the social aspect, handles great and the devs keep right on delivering!
REC ROOM!

39518454.review:
Rec Room is probably the best VR experience I've had to date.

Controls are fun and intuitive. There are a bunch of different minigames you can play and most of them are really enjoyable. 

The whole experience is really thoughtfully designed from top to bottom. Very few frustrations (menus are a little finicky).

Not much more to add.

It's free. It's fun. It's a great example of what VR can do and be.

Rec Room is a fun VR game with a multitude of modes and social features. It has RPG styled quest, paintball, laser tag, and several different variations on sports.

40949754.review: Devs and mods are super active. Community is kind and sympathetic. All the games and custom rooms are tons of fun, and the quest modes promote teamwork, friendship, and compassion.

40947183.review:

It's free (which even if you somehow don't like it means it can be deleted easily) ,  it has a simplictic yet charming design, is a sandbox game, you can customize your character from level up rewards, it's also online, and has many different games that you and your friends can play together. Overall it's the best free VR game on the market.




PS: No Ugandan knuckles here ;D

40937953.review: While most VR titles are simply paid "VR experiences" (tech demos at best), Rec Room feels like an actual game and a vr chat at the same time even though it is a free game. The Devs are constantly pushing out latge updates and new content, and free content at that, without introducing the micro transactions that non-vr titles are plagued with. Rec Room's community is by far the nicest that I have seen since everyone seems to be having a great time while sharing many laughs with complete strangers. Plus, the game is cross platform. If you have a VR headset, get this game. If you don't, get VR and THEN get this game.

40932409.review: SO. MUCH. FUN. All controls are very streamlined, and the ui is slick af! This is perfection!

40930018.review:
A good entry-level VR game. Features some classic games and activities ported into VR, as well as some new ones waiting to be tried out. The player base is good and family-friendly for the mosty part, however you should always be on the lookout for the occasional troll. I personally love the game, and pick it up every once and a while for paintball or one of the RPG style fantasy games.


In short: I love it, and it's free, so why not give it a try?

-VRchat without the Memes and trolls-

Even if I only have a very short experience yet, this game is a lot of fun
and a better alternative to VRchat, since here you have people to
interact with and not shout Memes around.

I can only recommend this game and think it's amazing that this game is for free.

The only thing is, that there are lot's of crashes as to this patch (Date is 22nd of March 2018)
And a lack of ability to create private lobbies (For 1V1 with friends for example) and not being able to spectate a game but only to play in it.

I can only repeat: Get this game! The Community is amazingly friendly (Even to the younger audience)

40916243.review: I would like to write a complete review for this game but I'm to addicted to it to waste time on doing that. I have quite a few VR games and this is the only game I play everyday and in less than 3 months it is now my 3rd most played game on steam. It's a cross platform game(Vive, Occulus,PSVR) so you will always find someone to play with. If you like co-op gaming then just download this game and jump into the quest type games. New content and improvements are added fairly often and it's completely free so you have nothing to lose.

40906092.review: Out of all the VR games I have, this is the one my friends and I keep on coming back to. Whether we're trying to complete a quest or relaxing playing charades we always have a great time. If you have a head-mounted display, I highly suggest you try this game. Best of all, it is free so if for some reason you don't like it you can always uninstall it and move on with your life.

40890963.review: It's free and one of the most active games on VR.  The community is generally very polite and helpful.  Lots of laughs to be had everytime you play.

40889100.review: This Was A Great Game, It Would Be Even Better To Revive The Feature The Game Had To Play On PC, I Loved That.

40884993.review:
As good as it gets in VR.

This is exactly one of the things I was hoping for, when I bought Vive.
Quests and paintball games are the best stuff I experience in VR by far. 
It's incredibly challenging, but it encourages you to get better and come back. Due to multiplayer system - you will never get tired of the games.
The matching system is great - if you're good you play with experienced players. If you just starting, you'll have equal challengers. 

And I can't believe - it's free. The level of content provided easily qulifies for monthly subscription and there are none.

40860853.review: I highly recommend Rec Room, it is ever changing and always has something to keep you busy. I prefer the coop mode 4 person quest line up of games. The style ranges from Bow and arrows and swords, to lazer rifles and shotguns, to pirate swords and flintlock pistols. Also not to mention the plethera of other modes, charades, disc golf, paddleball, dodgeball, laser tag, and paintball. I often find myself only playing Rec Room for weeks on end. I love it!

40859553.review: I bought my vive 4 months ago, and several games to go with it. I started Rec Room about 2 weeks after I got it, and haven't played any of my other games since. This is by far the best game so far on VR. The community is great and the devs are fantastic. There's new stuff added every few weeks, the game is already so different just since I first started playing. Can't reccomend this game enough!

40859120.review: Looking for one of the best VR experiences? Literally. Look no further.

40857781.review: Best (VR) social game with great and cool community. Very nice job dev team !

40856612.review: A very wholesome experience.  Everyone I have met is very polite and helpful, and the minigames are simple, but fun.  The only reason I stopped playing was because my vive broke and is currently been sent in for repair.

40856375.review: The BEST free VR game on earth! Does it have bugs? Yes, most games do, but the developers interact with the community so much that most bugs get fixed relatively quick. I definitely recommend this game to get a feel for VR and to be a part of a great community!

And it's free?!?! How?!

40758574.review: First of all its FREE!!! And this is a must for VR. Awesome fun to play with other people.

40749078.review: Very fun game and free too, but man what an annoying forced tutorial it has when you first start it up. Nothing more frustrating than an unskippable, forced multiplayer game with a random person. The tutorial and account creation process already takes long enough, it's crazy to force people to play a match they have zero interest with randoms in while everyone else in their party of friends waits.
40749078.developer_response:
Hey 320x200, 

I believe once you're out of your dorm room nothing should stop you from exiting to the Rec Center via the doors or navigating away via your watch. I know this is definitely the case if you have to wait more than 30 secs for the sample match, and I thought even before then. I'll look into it. 

Thanks for the feedback! We're always trying to improve the tutorial process and are looking into a system that will prompt players to choose a path once they leave the dorm room, with one of them being 'meet up with friends' if you've already got someone you'd like to go straight to. Hopefully that will meet some of your needs. If you'd like to give us more info on exactly how you'd like to see it change drop us a note at support@againstgrav.com 

Cheers!

40700424.review: I spent 12 straight hours with two random stranger from very far away and i had and still am having a great time meeting new and exiting people. To get the full expirience in this game you cant have 100% social anxiety because its not as fun if you dont interact with other people.

40674230.review: Man, I can't even write a "proper" review on this game. Ima just say this, don't let the cartooney graphics fool you into thinking it's a game meant for kids. It's a game for everyone, litterally! It cross-platform with Oculus, Vive, PlayStationVR, and Mixed Reality headsets. I joined in on a game of laser tag not expecting much. For the first 5min in I was still trying to figure out what was going on. About 15min in, I worked up a killstreak and had already began to talk trash to other players, lol in a fun way. After an hour or so, I was drenched. I had sweat dripping off my chin and my legs were sore from crouching and leaning around corners for long periods of time. I don't care how stupid I looked in the real world, that was the most fun game of Laser Tag I've ever had! I'm not a very social person but if you are, there's tons more in store for you talkitive types. Also, If you've got the GPU horsepower, supersample you game! Sniping in paintball is 2x easier when you have a much clearer image. I can get my sights on people within seconds of seeing them across the map and dropping them with a single shot. It's still possible to do at the default pixel density, but it's a lot easier when you SS.

40672004.review: I am a mean, angry idiot and I got myself banned becuase I couldn't control my temper around screaming kids. I am banned for 999 days and that is purely my fault. I genuinely hate myself for doing this. This game was the only thing that could keep my panic attacks at bay and help me to be social. And I ruined it. Just like I ruin everything.
40672004.developer_response:
Hey zpridgen75, 

We discussed why you were banned via email. The reason you list is not accurate and I think you know this. If you'd like to continue talking about it feel free to reply to the messages from conduct@againstgrav.com 

Cheers

40665947.review: Easily the best all around VR multiplayer experience in the current VR market. The quests are better than most full fledged VR titles costing $20-30.

40662464.review: This game is amazing. It has multiple fun game modes and a bunch of single or multiplayer quest modes. This is all with the added touch of social interaction like that of VR Chat. (Although after experiencing the luxuries of these interactions it's quite frustrating when you meet someone who doesn't talk, especially in a quest) The best part is that all of this is free. My one problem is that it's a bit too childish at times. The avatars look somewhat like a toddlers drawing, except for the watches. While I do enjoy cartoon-like things, everything in the game feels like it's trying just a little too hard to be a cartoon. Despite this, if you have VR, I highly recommend that you get this game.

40569487.review:
Honestly it's probably the most polished social-focused VR title. The minigames are intense and fun, with the team-based melee or shooting focussed games being the highlight for me. The social environments and activities are also engaging and hilarious, like charades or just dicking around with some friends in the sandbox spaces.
The only downside, and what was the dealbreaker for me is that I felt the player base was quite young.
I'm only 20 and I can say that most of the player base, at least the vocal players are 16 and under for some reason. There is an option to filter out younger players but I can't feel it working that much, as its up to the players to be honest about their age whilsts signing up.

All in all, if you have a friend or two to go in with you, go for it, it's a great VR experience.

40566758.review: anyone who thinks the minigames are good have clearly never played other vr games
40566758.developer_response:
I've played other VR games and I think they're good :) 

If you'd like to provide feedback about how you'd improve the games feel free to shoot us a note at support@againstgrav.com 

Cheers!

40566479.review:
One of the best multiplayer experiences i've ever had, even non VR games! Its just really fun!

40560293.review:
I can't recommend this game to any adult as the game is seemingly populated by children only.
I can't really recommend parents letting their children play this either as the userbase is extremely rude and verbally filthy, which is no surprise considering the juvenile userbase.
I suppose it's an excellent game for 12-14 year olds.
40560293.developer_response:
Hey Tungdil, 

Sorry you had a bad experience. I assure you there are plenty of adults who play Rec Room since I'm one of them and have a lot of friends my age that also play :) 

If you run into players who are breaking our Code of Conduct and being verbally abusive or are clearly underage please report them: https://www.againstgrav.com/reporting 

We also have a ton of other comfort options like muting a player, muting all players, blocking players (this hides their avatar, tells matchmaking to avoid putting you into the same games together, and prevents them from ever joining one of your custom rooms). We also have the teleport bubble and space bubble to keep players out of your physical space, and more. 

If you find all of these tools inadequate for customizing your experience please let us know what you would change or add at support@againstgrav.com 

Thanks!

新クエストはステージごとの個性がありギミックもすごくUSJやディズニーのテーマパークを一日中体験した様な気分になれます
レゴを組み立てて作った様な幻想的な世界に思わず「おお」って言ってしまいました
剣振ったりハイタッチする為に手を伸ばしたり敵の弾を避ける為VRで一番体動かす
その為よくコントローラーぶつけたりするので狭い部屋の人は注意
あと言語が通じなくて不安になるかもしれないがcome hereとかbehind youとかヘルプ辺り覚えてればおk
伝えたい事は言い切れない程ありますが是非プレイしてみて下さい

40509577.review:
I first got Rec room as a reccomendation by my brother. If there's any point to this review, it's that I am so glad I listened and got it!

It's a fantastic game which encorporates each corner of VR from PSVR to HTC Vive - everyone can play together.

There are many decent games to play within as well as a nice lobby area which everyone can meet and relax. You can create custom rooms (I really want to make one but have no ideas) and design your own activities.

It only took me a day to tell my brother I would happily pay for this game as it truely deserves it!

Keep up the fantastic work.

40509158.review: Was a lot of fun at first, but then the children took it over. Its lame now :(
40509158.developer_response:
Hey Bones, 

Sorry you had a bad experience. I assure you there are plenty of adults who play Rec Room since I'm one of them and have a lot of friends my age that also play :)

If you'd like to find groups of people to hop in with check out or Discord server: https://discord.gg/recroom 

If you run into players who you believe are clearly 12 or younger, please report them: https://www.againstgrav.com/reporting 

We also have a ton of other comfort options like muting a player, muting all players, blocking players (this hides their avatar, tells matchmaking to avoid putting you into the same games together, and prevents them from ever joining one of your custom rooms). We also have the teleport bubble and space bubble to keep players out of your physical space, and more. 

If you find all of these tools inadequate for customizing your experience please let us know what you would change or add at support@againstgrav.com 

Thanks!

40432602.review:
Wer eine VR-Brille besitzt, wird früher oder später über Rec Room stolpern. (getestet mit der HTC Vive)
Hier bekommen wir gratis eine Mischung aus Social-App und jeder Menge Minispiele.
Ob man sich nur trifft, um gemeinsam in der Lobby ein wenig Unfug anzustellen, sich durch die Questreihen ballert, Paintball gegeneinander spielt oder eine entspannte Runde Discgolf zockt (uvm), hier wird jede Menge Abwechslung geboten.
Zusätzlich können wir uns einen Gruppenraum erstellen um dort mit unseren Freunden abzuhängen. Als Anreiz gibt es tägliche und wöchentliche Aufgaben zu meistern, durch die wir uns (wie auch durch Zocken allgemein) Belohnungen anhand von Ausrüstungsgegenständen erspielen können.
Die Grafik ist recht simpel gehalten, passt aber zum Spiel. (läuft auch mit einer GTX 970 noch sehr gut)
Zur Fortbewegung dient die Teleportation.
Über eine Uhr an unserem Handgelenk haben wir die Möglichkeit, direkt Spiele zu starten, Freunde einzuladen und mehr.
Witzig ist, per Handschlag Freundschaften zu schließen oder per High5 einer Gruppe beizutreten.
Einziges Manko ist, dass viele Kinder angelockt werden, was teils etwas nervig sein kann. (wenn man nicht gerade selbst Kind ist;))
Zusätzlich ist noch positiv zu erwähnen, dass Rec Room plattformübergreifend gezockt werden kann, vorbildlich.
Was hier gratis geboten wird ist schon der Knaller, daher nicht zögern, runterladen!
Gruß Ziffi
Ziffi´s Spieletipps als Kurator: http://store.steampowered.com/curator/5837414/

vr은 이런거구나..하고 느끼게 만드는 게임입니다.멀티 플레이가 압권이고,여럿이 테이블에 모여서 한 사람이 가운데서 

그림을 그려 맞추는것도 너무 너무 재미있고,서바이벌 페인트볼 등등 세계 여러나라 친구들과 함께 게임을 할 수있다는것도 좋고,

40330615.review: Probably the best free multiplayer VR game there is out there. When I play video games, and see a prop on the ground, I normally hope I can interact with it, and I normally can't. In this game, you can interact with all the items, and that is probably my favorite feature.

40326744.review: The teleporting can be a little wonky but overall a pretty fun game

40312580.review:
As a supporter of free software, this masterpiece instantaneously aroused my interest due to the fact that it is free. While in general, you sometimes have some reduced support or a lack of quality in free software, Rec Room is a prime example where it is the other way round. In fact, it is really hard to find a better VR game out there, and for most games that only get close to the quality of Rec Room, you have to pay quite a bunch of money.

I remember when I got my Vive and started Rec Room for the first time. The moment when I met another person in VR was quite weired, because it felt somehow quite intimidating when an unknown person seems to be in your living room. Some minutes later, this feeling was completely replaced by an extremety of joy when I played Paintball or the Coop-Quests.

Overally, definitely give Rec Room a try!

The only drawback is that I have not found a hairstyle that fits to mine in real life :-)

39994461.review:
This is without a doubt the best VR game. 
- Massive amount of varied content (Paintball, laser tag, sports and charades)
- Multiplayer
- Good friendly community
- Constant content updates
- Fun! (I like the quests!)

It works on every major VR headset.
- Vive
- Oculus
- Windows Mixed
- PSVR

And is cross-compatible between the mentioned headsets. (So you can play on your Vive with your friend on his PSVR)

And it's free! There is no harm in getting this game, and you can get it on every system. This is a staple of VR games and sets the bar for future games.

39825078.review:
This game is awesome! I love the social aspect, and how easy it is to make new friends, that you don't have to stay with. 

This game is very competitive, but not to the point where you hate the other team. 

If you can get past the constant glitches/ bugs/ dissconnects, and the overwhelming number of kids who dont know what they're doing, and the game sometimes just not working in general, It's actually one of the best VR experiences as of right now. And it's free. 

I would suggest that this game needs a clear way to turn it off Properly, because it never shuts down quite right, making all my other games not work untill I restart my computer. and after restarting it says its missing an exicutable, rendering steam vr usless untill, yet again, a restart. also this game needs a little more multiplayer polish. every once and a while, I randomly disconnect from paintball as soon as I get into my groove. i seem to get alot of "error 1's and 'error 6 or 7"s.
if a dev reaqds this they should lnow what im talking about and might fix it in the future.

if you are a dev and reading this... I love this game, keep up the awesome work, and never ever get rid of paintball... but all the errors i talked about happen way too often then i can handle. And it really pisses me and my computer off.

39821093.review:

Whether you're new or more experienced with VR headsets this is mega fun and best of all FREE. Nothing to lose at all.

39816780.review:
Excellent game and it's free.  Also, the support is outstanding. I had an issue a month ago and contacted support. They were very responsive, and recently posted a solution to the issue. I use  a Windows Mixed Reality headset and was having issues. The game would crash.  The solution below for WMR headsets. BTW it also fixed my "The Lab" crashing, by doing the same for the executables in The Lab.


"There is a known incompatibility issue with the current version of Rec Room and some AMD graphics cards (especially the Radeon RX 400 and Radeon RX 500 series) while playing through SteamVR. This is even more common for players using Windows MR headsets and/or on Windows Insider Preview builds of Windows 10.

While we continue to investigate the underlying issue for a permanent fix, here is a simple workaround that should fix the problem for the time being. This might need to be re-applied when the game is updated:

Go to the game’s install directory

Steam: Usually C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\RecRoom

Oculus: Usually C:\Program Files\Oculus\Software\Software\against-gravity-rec-room

Right click on the Rec Room executable (Recroom_Release.exe) and click “Properties”

Go to the “Compatibility” tab and check the option “Disable fullscreen optimizations”
  
Click “Apply”

39736545.developer_response:

39723764.review: this game is great but i wish there was an option for multiple severs and more games maybe a object spawner would be good

39715937.review: Simple, fun, sociable and freindly vr with other people is a whole other kind of experience love it and its free :):)

39715171.review:
Surprisingly fun and enjoyable VR experience,
For a free game this has been one of the most enjoyable VR games I have played with hours of fun and a good amount of activities to do.

Now with PS4VR players it is one of the few true cross platform games out there.

Sure you get some kids on there squeaking and carrying on, but that is to be expected with the aesthetics and type of community this game has gone for.
Being a family friendly designed game if someone should be disruptive it is really easy to mute/block and or lodge a removal request if someone is interuptive to an activities progress or being a general douchbag.

There is a good number of things to do in this game the activities I play the most are:
Laser Tag (Red vs Blue PvPvE match, enemy bots and players to win)
Quests (PvE 4 person dungeon run type game mode.. wipe = reset progress)
Frisbee Golf (Think golf... with a frisbee... fun and infuriating)
Outside of these main games.. there are Daily's and Weekly goals which will encourage you to play the other games like VR Charades, Paddleball, Soccer, and Paintball plus more...

Theres a basic progression via levels which is earned by just doing activities.
As you play there is also cosmetics you unlock/collect to change your appearance with unique rewards only obtainable by playing certain activities and in some cases getting above a certain score level.

All-in-all great fun game and well worth having a crack if have VR.

39700178.review: WAAAAAAAAAAAAAY too many screaming children but overall the game is pretty fun.

39692617.review: A vr recreation of wii but better

39690263.review: This was a great game! That is until they tried to connect the game with Rec.room.net now you can't even get on. Two weeks without recroom even after two reinstalls has started to turn me away from the game and I find myself spending more time on other games.
39690263.developer_response: The Rec.Net site should have no impact on your ability to play Rec Room? Please send us a screenshot of where you are hitting the issue: support@againstgrav.com

39684845.review: I didnt know what to think getting into this style of game, after 30min of setting up my account I founf this to be the coolest game ever.!! I wouldnt have expected it to be so much fun!!

39672505.review: This is a great social club atmosphere that works well on basically every VR system, the vive, the rift, WMR, PSVR, they seem to all work really well, I look at this as a superior version of VRChat with a bunch of minigames. Full review later.

39657708.review:
Fun game, very kind people! :) I really really really like some people! They are so nice

You got some shit ass people sometimes, but f#ck them! I love this game sooo much! :D


11/10 :D

39644567.review: A must play for any one who has VR ..... using mic on my vive while playing online with people is an awesome experience ... really made my day ...played 3 hours straight in one go .. couldn’t do that in any other game !!

39622549.review:
星战副本日常：Hey dude，I forgot to bright a gun.    
5分钟后：捡起倒下的队友的枪，看到另一个举着大♂枪的队友过去扶他，表面不小心shot倒然后......
这一手智取大♂枪看队友怎么说~
